message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot more than that. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I am willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $9,500 is a bit too low. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is still a great deal for you, and it's closer to what I'm looking for.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
